name: Sonna the Hooker
description:
'Sonna the Hooker' is my game entry for the cyberpunk jam 3/2014 (theme 'Height').

Its all about skydiving, hooking at the last moment for increasing speed, and getting to the floor as fast as possible.

Sonna uses his grappling hook (his cybernetic hand) to hook around.

Information about the development (soon) at my website.

You can edit the .gfig files to mod the game (making your own levels, changing textures, etc.)

To mod, open the .gfig files. Those are text files. They're much better to work with if you use Notepad++ to edit them, setting Python as language.
